title: How to Download and Install Microsoft Edge

steps.title: Open the Microsoft Store .
steps.content: Open the Microsoft Store . This icon has a shopping bag with the Microsoft logo on it.

steps.title: Type Edge into the search bar.
steps.content: Type Edge into the search bar. Microsoft Edge should be the top result.

steps.title: Select "Install".
steps.content: Select "Install". This will download Microsoft Edge to your computer.

steps.title: Enter your administrator username and password.
steps.content: Enter your administrator username and password. If User Account Control is enabled, you may be prompted to accept the prompt. Enter your username and password if prompted and click on Yes .

steps.title: Let the download proceed.
steps.content: Let the download proceed. It should take only a few minutes to download the new browser to your PC.

steps.title: Close Microsoft Edge when prompted.
steps.content: Close Microsoft Edge when prompted. Note that once the installation is done, all of your browsing data will remain intact.

steps.title: Complete the initial setup.
steps.content: Complete the initial setup. After the installation is complete, you will be asked to sign in with a Microsoft account (if you have not already), enable sync, set your browser as default, and choose a home/new tab page layout. You may also be prompted to reenable extensions.

steps.title: Open the Google Play Store .
steps.content: Open the Google Play Store . This icon has a picture of a multi-colored triangle.

steps.title: Type Edge into the search bar.
steps.content: Type Edge into the search bar. Microsoft Edge should be the top result.

steps.title: Select "Install".
steps.content: Select "Install". This will download Microsoft Edge to your Android device.

steps.title: Complete the initial setup.
steps.content: Complete the initial setup. After the installation is complete, you will be asked to sign in with a Microsoft account (if you have not already), enable sync, set your browser as default, and choose a home/new tab page layout.

steps.title: Open the App Store .
steps.content: Open the App Store . This icon has a picture of a multi-colored triangle.

steps.title: Type Edge into the search bar.
steps.content: Type Edge into the search bar. Microsoft Edge should be the top result.

steps.title: Select "Install".
steps.content: Select "Install". This will download Microsoft Edge to your iOS device.

steps.title: Complete the initial setup.
steps.content: Complete the initial setup. After the installation is complete, you will be asked to sign in with a Microsoft account (if you have not already), enable sync, set your browser as default, and choose a home/new tab page layout.

steps.title: Go to https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/edge.
steps.content: Go to https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/edge . This is the official website for the new Microsoft Edge.

steps.title: Click on the download link in the center of the page.
steps.content: Click on the download link in the center of the page. Accept the terms of use.

steps.title: Click on Accept and Download.
steps.content: Click on Accept and Download . This will download the installer to your PC or Mac.

steps.title: Click on Open.
steps.content: Click on Open . This will start the installation process.

steps.title: Enter your administrator username and password.
steps.content: Enter your administrator username and password. If User Account Control is enabled, or if you are installing on a Mac computer, you may be prompted to accept the prompt. Enter your username and password if prompted and click on OK or Yes .

steps.title: Let the download proceed.
steps.content: Let the download proceed. It should take only a few minutes to download the new browser to your device.

steps.title: Close Microsoft Edge when prompted.
steps.content: Close Microsoft Edge when prompted. If you are installing on a PC or Mac, you need to close Edge before you can proceed. Note that once the installation is done, all of your browsing data will remain intact.

steps.title: Complete the initial setup.
steps.content: Complete the initial setup. After the installation is complete, you will be asked to sign in with a Microsoft account (if you have not already), enable sync, set your browser as default, and choose a home/new tab page layout. You may also be prompted to reenable extensions.
